scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Deeds, agreements, and receipts of Isaac Doty, a resident of New York City who lived at the corner of Oak and Pearl Streets. There is also one letter to Doty from his nephew, Benjamin Doughty of the town of Jericho in Queens County. One deed involves William Doughty, who is presumed to also be a family relative of Isaac Doty. Items span 1797 to 1823.
